Med Ball step in and throw. A beneficial exercise for any golfers looking to improve the sequencing of the downswing. The exercise will give you the feeling of good sequencing, which you can then use to help transfer it when you have a club in your hand. https://t.co/d86ujDqtV2
@JackWells009 @Fit_For_Golf @gshawgolf @DanPhysio If the larger mass is fat and not muscle!

@JackWells009 @Fit_For_Golf @gshawgolf @DanPhysio Pretty obvious larger mass can lead to increased CHS. But larger mass has detrimental effects. Stamina over 72 holes or amateur championships 108 holes.
